name: Praxre
description:
fullscreen + headphone are recommended

It is my Ludumdare41 game. I made in 3 days with unity3d.

 fishing + horror + dress up = praxre

 I mixed 3 genres instead of 2 

 Praxre that name of monster is crypto name of something . You should  follow the path until port then sail and catch tiny fishes. Praxre likes fishing too lol. in the end of other port , there is a little note .

P.S= I selected Jam but I wasn't in a group,I will add a gun for kill Praxre. Item swapping, pixelated effect button, ,little farms and maybe a story that you want

MY ENTRY LINK :https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/41/praxre
